content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining and Storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities:
-  Burner mining drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Chest at position (x=42.5, y=-83.5) for coal storage
-  Burner inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) for transferring coal
-  Chest at position (x=44.5, y=-81.5) for coal storage
-  Chest at position (x=43.5, y=-79.5) for coal storage

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using extracting but being too far
-  Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items
### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place a entity to a tile before attempting placing
### Errors when drill is out of fuel
- Refuel the drill when it is out of fuel to continue mining
### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt
### Errors when inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to transfer items
### Errors when chest is full
- Empty the chest before attempting to transfer items into it
### Errors when no coal in the chest
- Ensure there is coal in the chest before attempting to extract coal
### Errors when no iron ore in the inventory
- Ensure there is iron ore in the inventory before attempting to smelt
### Errors when no burner mining drill in inventory
- Ensure there is a burner mining drill in the inventory before attempting to mine
